701175f-a.title: Bronx: Grand Concourse - 184th Street
701175f-a.text:
Grand Concourse, west side, north from but not including E. 184th Street, showing W.P.A. men repaving the west lane of the thoroughfare. Shown, too, is Loew's Paradise Theatre.
April 27, 1936
Works Progress Administration
Federal Art Project photo
N6c ~ ieoA
